entries: You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

You have a +1 bonus to all checks made using this magic instrument. If you are a bard and proficient with the instrument, it counts as a +1 arcane focus for you.

magicvariant.name: Shield (*) +1
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item shield +1|owl}}.

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.

magicvariant.name: Adamantine Ammunition
entries: Ammunition made of adamantine is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Ammunition made of adamantine have an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with the enchantment bonus of the weapon used.

Ammunition made of adamantine is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Ammunition made of adamantine have an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with the enchantment bonus of the weapon used.

This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of 9 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine Armor has a passive DR against non-magical physical damage depending on their weight class, that scales with their enchantment bonus.

This focus is made of adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine focuses have an increased chance to score a critical hit when used as a weapon that scales with their enchantment bonus.

This instruments parts are made of adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine focuses have an increased chance to score a critical hit when used as a weapon that scales with their enchantment bonus.

This shield is reinforced with adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Adamantine shields has a passive DR against non-magical physical damage depending on their weight class, as well as an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with their enchantment bonus.

This tool is made of adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Tools made of adamantine have an increased chance to roll a critical that scales with the enchantment bonus of the tool.

This weapon is made of adamantine, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It can't break, chip, or be damaged by most mundane means. Weapons made of adamantine have an increased chance to score a critical hit that scales with the enchantment bonus of the weapon.

magicvariant.name: Masterwork Mithral Ammunition
entries: Ammunition made of mithral is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular ammunition.
Ammunition made of mithral is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular ammunition.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of masterwork ammunition.
{@b Masterwork.} This item is crafted incredibly well.

This suit of armor is reinforced with mithral, enabling it to go to a net of 9 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular armor. Mithral armor is one size class lower than their normal counterparts (Heavy -> Medium -> Light). This armor suffers no stealth disadvantage, even if its normal counterpart would.
You have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC while wearing this armor.
{@b Masterwork.} This armor is crafted incredibly well.
This focus is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular focus.

This shield is reinforced with mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular shield. A Mithral shield is one size class lower than their normal counterparts (Heavy -> Medium -> Light -> Parrying).

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.

This tool is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular tool.
You have a +1 bonus to all checks made using this masterwork tool. If you are an artificer and proficient with the tool, it counts as a masterwork arcane focus for you.

This weapon is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular weapon. It has an increased range with the {@b Thrown} property. A mithral weapon is one weight class lower than their normal counterpart (Heavy -> Normal -> Light). A mithral weapon that is normally {@b Light} and non-finesse becomes {@b Light} and {@b Finesse}.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this masterwork weapon.
{@b Masterwork.} This item is crafted incredibly well.

magicvariant.name: Mithral Ammunition
entries: Ammunition made of mithral is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular ammunition.
Ammunition made of mithral is capable of going to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular ammunition.

This suit of armor is reinforced with mithral, enabling it to go to a net of 9 without breaking. It weighs half as much as regular armor. Mithral armor is one size class lower than their normal counterparts (Heavy -> Medium -> Light). This armor suffers no stealth disadvantage, even if its normal counterpart would.
This focus is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular focus.
This instruments parts are made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular instrument.

magicvariant.name: Mithral Shield (*)
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item mithral shield|owl}}.

This shield is reinforced with mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular shield. A Mithral shield is one size class lower than their normal counterparts (Heavy -> Medium -> Light -> Parrying).
This tool is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular tool.

This weapon is made of mithral, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking. It weighs half as much as a regular weapon. It has an increased range with the {@b Thrown} property. A mithral weapon is one weight class lower than their normal counterpart (Heavy -> Normal -> Light). A mithral weapon that is normally {@b Light} and non-finesse becomes {@b Light} and {@b Finesse}.

You have a +3 bonus to all checks made using this magic instrument. If you are a bard and proficient with the instrument, it counts as a +3 arcane focus for you.

magicvariant.name: Tempered Steel Shield (*) +3
entries: {@note * This generic variant has the same name and source as the item {@item tempered steel shield +1|owl}}.

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
This shield is reinforced with tempered steel, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking.

While holding this shield, you have a {=bonusAc} bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC. If the shield has the ability to parry, it gains a {=bonusAc} bonus to the result of any parrying roll made by it.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
This tool is made of tempered steel, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking.
You have a +3 bonus to all checks made using this magic tool. If you are an artificer and proficient with the tool, it counts as a +3 arcane focus for you.
This weapon is made of tempered steel, enabling it to go to a net of -1 without breaking.
You have a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
{@b Magical.} This item is magical.
